unnormalised: Auto Buzz: Is Your Car Giving You Mileage Sadness This Diwali?
normalised: Auto Buzz: Is Your Car Giving You Mileage Sadness This Diwali?

unnormalised: Diwali's just around the corner, and the excitement is building! But before you hit the road to visit family in Kerala or Goa, are you sure your car's ready for the long drive? Fuel prices are still making everyone sweat, and nobody wants to burn a hole in their pocket (bigger than the one already caused by buying all those Diwali sweets!).
normalised: Diwali's just around the corner, and the excitement is building! But before you hit the road to visit family in Kerala or Goa, are you sure your car's ready for the long drive? Fuel prices are still making everyone sweat, and nobody wants to burn a hole in their pocket (bigger than the one already caused by buying all those Diwali sweets!).

unnormalised: The latest reports are showing a renewed focus on fuel efficiency, even with all these fancy new SUVs hitting the market. Seems like folks are remembering how much they loved those frugal little hatchbacks.
normalised: The latest reports are showing a renewed focus on fuel efficiency, even with all these fancy new S U V s hitting the market. Seems like folks are remembering how much they loved those frugal little hatchbacks.

unnormalised: Experts at ARAI, Pune, are suggesting checking your tire pressure and getting a tune-up before any major trip. A well-maintained engine can make a surprising difference.
normalised: Experts at A R A I, Pune, are suggesting checking your tire pressure and getting a tune-up before any major trip. A well-maintained engine can make a surprising difference.

unnormalised: And hey, maybe carpool with some friends and split the costs! More importantly, think about grabbing some biryani for the road. Nothing worse than driving hangry. Drive safe this Diwali! Every km counts, and so does every rupee! Don't let bad mileage ruin your celebrations.
normalised: And hey, maybe carpool with some friends and split the costs! More importantly, think about grabbing some biryani for the road. Nothing worse than driving hangry. Drive safe this Diwali! Every kilometer counts, and so does every rupee! Don't let bad mileage ruin your celebrations.
